## Overview

This vignette describes the scaffold of the Lab5 package. Fill in the missing
pieces with real API calls, tests, and documentation as you progress through the
lab assignment.

## Configuring the API base URL

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(Lab5)
set_api_base_url("https://api.example.com")
```

## Implementing API calls

```{r eval = FALSE}
fetch_api_resource("status")
```

The exported `fetch_api_resource()` function currently throws an informative
error. Replace its body with the logic required for the API you decide to use.
